page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: {Cricket, gardening}and, in particular, {golf, fishing and bowls,}appeal to many men in the{summer}as does{snooker and visiting the{Leisure Centre}about 5 miles away during{winter.}Most local farmers support the{local hunt. Darts} and watching, or playing in, one of the 2{football teams}is popular. For women there are several{local {groups,}e.g. the{W.I.}There are several{darts teams} and an active{ {hockey team.} Children strongly support {clubs}such as{Scouts, Guides,}etc.,or the{Bro {Teifi Brass Band. Discos,cycling}and {playing}with friends are also popular. Winter activities are{computers}and { {indoor games.} Many boys are involved with one or other of the 3 junior { {football }teams. {Watching TV,videos,tennis}and{swimming are popular but{Reading}is decreasing.
